meanings.definition: A small image or picture used to represent a larger image or document.
meanings.sent1: I clicked on the thumbnails to see the full-size pictures.
meanings.sent2: The website displays thumbnails of all the photos in the album.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue hidden in the thumbnails of the case file.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a collection of thumbnails, each one holding a different moment.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully arranged the thumbnails to create a stunning mosaic.

meanings.definition: A small drawing or sketch done quickly and with little detail.
meanings.sent1: She doodled thumbnails in the margins of her notebook during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The designer presented several thumbnails before starting the final artwork.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked the students to create thumbnails of their upcoming projects.
meanings.sent4: His mind was filled with thumbnails of ideas waiting to be developed.
meanings.sent5: The illustrator sketched thumbnails to plan out the layout of the book.
